review: The game has lacking in every aspect.Unfavorable.Still a pretty impresive effort when considering only one man developed the whole Dead Bits game.Dubstep and unity engine fans might take a look at it.Overall boring.

review: The first 'ZOMBA' -  Zombie Online Multiplayer Battle Arena as they say it.A genuinely good MOBA set-up.Nicely polished and practically bug free.The best Dead Island game.While maintaining a lot of simple bashing-n-shooting of the core series games, Epidemic takes enough of the MOBA to give some strategic excitement.

helpful: 1 of 6 people (17%) found this review helpful
review: One of the best competitive games of all times.One of the best first person shooters available right now.The game has a unique character thanks to the required combination of tactical insight and pure skills.The awesome old-school shooter has convinced us that Counter-Strike franchise is in no way to be forgotten.Global offensive will always be a multiplayer classic for those who are keen to put in the time to learn the maps and weapons.
